original_text: Jesus then began to explain to them what Moses and all God's prophets had taught. He showed them what they wrote in the Bible about himself.
korean_text: 이에 모세와 모든 선지자의 글로 시작하여 모든 성경에 쓴 바 자기에 관한 것을 자세히 설명하시니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus then began to explain to them
what Moses and all God's prophets had taught
sentences.korean_translation: 모세와 모든 하나님의 선지자들이 가르친 것이 무엇인지

sentences.original_text: He showed them what they wrote
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 쓴 것이 무엇인지 보여주셨다
